problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): It was time for parent teacher conferences, and I was very much looking forward to talking with the parents of two particular students, one whose parents are on public assistance and the other whose parents are quite rich. The parents on public assistance never showed up and didn't even send a note, so I've just never heard from them and it's now the end of the year. The quite rich parents showed up on time and wanted to hear everything about how their child was doing, though.
Question: Who ignores their kids' education?
ans0: The parents on public assistance
ans1: Not enough info
ans2: The quite rich parents
